title: Invisible Salamanders Are Not What You Think
summary: Ever since the Invisible Salamanders paper was published, there has been a quiet renaissance within my friends and colleagues in applied cryptography for studying systems that use Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) constructions, understanding what implicit assumptions these systems make about the guarantees of the AEAD mode they chose to build upon, and the [â€¦]
